title: PCAA holds mock security exercise at Rahim Yar Khan Airport
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 25 (APP):The Pakistan Civil Aviation Authority (PCAA) held a mock security exercise at Sheikh Zayed International Airport, also known as Rahim Yar Khan Airport, to tackle emergencies and any untoward incidents.
Personnel of Airport Security Force, Punjab Police, Army, Rangers, Elite Squad, Rescue-1122, Health Department and Special Branch Punjab Police, participated in the joint exercise, carried out to tackle any law and order situation in a highly professional manner, PCAA spokesman said in a news release on Wednesday.
Besides, the teams of Pakistan International Airlines and the Airport Vigilance Section, remained actively engaged in the exercise.
The spokesman said the objective of the exercise was to test the quality and effectiveness of coordination and communication between various agencies at the airport and added “The security agencies achieved the targets of the exercise in time.”
